content: plarn gift bag plarn yarn made from plastic bags instructions for making plarn can be found at http //marloscrochetcorner com/bag%20cutting%20instructions html supplies needed ½ plarn - approx 32½ yards h crochet hook finished size 4 x 4 round 1 chain 14 2 half_double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook half_double_crochet across working 2 half_double_crochet in last chain turn and work in bottom loops of chain half_double_crochet across join 28 sts rnds 2-10 chain 1 half_double_crochet in each st around join 28 sts round 11 chain 1 half_double_crochet in first 9 sts of round chain 5 skip 5 stitchs half_double_crochet in next 9 sts chain 5 join round 12 chain 1 half_double_crochet in each st around each chain counts as one st join 28 sts fasten_off weave in ends © 2009 joyce noverr ladynthread for personal or nonprofit use only
